name: Ace
summary: Elite mercenary organization of exactly 52 members divided into four Suits (Spades, Diamonds, Hearts, Clubs) of 13 ranked members each. Led by the Ace of Spades. Every member wears a mask and suit displaying their card designation. First confirmed appearance: War of Fodon (820â€“847 ACC), hired to protect the Bug District. Currently holds a law enforcement contract in Adlens. Less publicly documented than even the Arashi.
